User: Voice Assistant, I'm running low on pet food, I need to reorder.
Voice_Assistant: Ok, adding dog food to your shopping list.
Context: I was telling her that I was low on "pet food" which in this context means cat food, as they're the only pets I have. She inexplicably randomly put Purina dry DOG food on the list. I know I should have said cat but as far as I know I had used the term pet food before and it was no issue. It's a force of habit from having so many types of pets throughout my life to say pet instead of specify cat in a situation like that.
device: Smart home device without a visual interface (e.g. Google Home, Amazon Echo, Apple HomePod)
